title: Whale tracking
description: Whales, or large holders of cryptocurrencies, can significantly influence market dynamics. Tracking whale transactions, especially large movements to or from exchanges, can provide early signals of potential market shifts.

title: Money flow
description: Stay on top of market liquidity with our advanced models that track cryptocurrency inflows and outflows from exchanges.

title: NVT Ratio Network Value to Transactions (NVT) Ratio
description: This metric compares a blockchain's market cap to the volume of transactions on its network.
